title: The World Game
plot_summary: The World Game goes beyond the highlight reel. In depth feature stories about the players, managers, fans and politics as well as a round up of England, Spain, France, Germany, Scotland, Brazil, Argentina and the Netherlands Leagues. Country, Team and player profiles keep you updated on the latest and Football Legends covers some of the greatest players and moments in Football history.
flag: runtime differential: omdb 60 min vs tvr 30
